page.title: 14TRANSPORT & HAULAGE
page.content: BUS services on the areas 4 main routes are infrequent to nil. The road from Thornhill to Blairdrummond has an Aberfoyle - Stirling service, Deanston village a Callander-Stirling service, while from Creityhall to Bankhead road the Callander & Crianlarich-Stirling buses are available.The Thornhill- Loch-hill Toll and South Callander roads do not have public transport services.School children are taken by car or bus to Primary Schools & Secondary School pupils are all transported by special contract- hire buses to Callander. Goods Transport firms:-Doune Motors, W.D.MacLaren, H McTurk & Son, James Stewart, and M.P. Shreter, operate from within the area. Most farms have private means of moving stock and produce, by float or tractor & trailer Most families have private cars.
